name: Bombay Sweets Mr. Twist
description:
Bombay Sweets Mr. Twist 20 gm is a tasty and crunchy potato-based snack that comes in a unique twisted shape. This snack is popular among youngsters for its fun texture and flavorful taste. It is made from potato flakes and potato starch, seasoned with a blend of spices to deliver a tangy, savory experience. Available in a Tomato Paprika flavor, it is an enjoyable snack perfect for quick bites or on-the-go munching. The 20 gm pack is ideal for individual consumption or sharing.

name: Bombay Sweets Cheese Ball Cheezee Corn Snacks
description:
The Bombay Sweets Cheese Ball Cheezee Corn Snacks (15 gm) offer a crunchy and flavorful snack, perfect for enjoying a light bite. Made with rice flour, vegetable oil, and a blend of spices, it has a rich, cheesy taste and is a popular choice for those looking for a savory, satisfying snack. It has a calorie count of approximately 94 per serving, with 3 grams of protein and no cholesterol. Rice flour, vegetable oil, and spices are the components. Calories: 94, protein: 3 grams, and cholesterol: none.

description:

These gluten-free crackers are an ideal snack for any time of day, providing a tasty and wholesome treat that fits into your healthy lifestyle.

name: Bombay Sweets Potato Crackers
description:
Bombay Sweets Potato Crackers is a popular light and crispy snack made from a blend of potato and wheat flour. Known for its distinctive spicy tomato flavor, this snack has been a flagship product of Bombay Sweets for many years. It is a go-to choice for those who enjoy savory, flavorful snacks. Key Ingredients:Potato flakesPotato starchWheat flourRefined vegetable oilSeasoning Packaging & Storage:Net weight: 25 gmStore in a cool, dry place. Once opened, transfer to an airtight container to maintain freshness. This snack is a perfect companion for tea-time or a quick bite on the go​.

Potato flakes

name: Kurkure American Style Cream & Onion Chips
description:
Kurkure American Style Cream & Onion Chips 25 gm are a delightful and savory snack that brings the classic flavors of creamy onions to your snacking experience. These corn-based snacks are known for their distinctive twisted shape and a creamy onion seasoning that offers a harmonious blend of creaminess and mild tanginess. Enjoy the creamy and savory goodness of Kurkure American Style Cream & Onion Chips during your snack breaks and elevate your snacking moments.

name: Bombay Sweets Alooz Spanish Tomato Flavor
description:
Bombay Sweets Alooz Spanish Tomato Flavor chips (25 gm) offer a delicious snack experience with their tangy and zesty Spanish tomato seasoning. Made from high-quality potatoes, these chips have a crisp texture, ideal for snacking at any time. They are cholesterol-free, making them a healthier snack choice, and each pack contains 139 calories with 2g of protein. The 25 gm pack is convenient for on-the-go munching. These chips bring a flavorful mix of spices and a touch of local Bengali authenticity with the vibrant tomato flavor.

name: Lay's Thai Style Spicy Chicken Potato Chips
description:
Lay's Thai Style Spicy Chicken Potato Chips 13g bring a burst of bold, spicy flavor with a savory chicken taste, inspired by Thai cuisine. Made from high-quality potatoes, these chips are seasoned with a flavorful mix of chicken and spices, delivering a satisfying crunch and a kick of heat in every bite. Whether we are engaging in conversations, sharing stories or simply enjoying a good laugh, Yokozona adds a memorable touch to the moment.

name: Bombay Sweets Alooz Waves Phuchka
description:
Bombay Alooz Waves Phuchka Crackers are a popular snack they are crispy crackers made from potatoes and flavored with various spices, including cumin, coriander, turmeric, and chili powder. To make Bombay Potato Crackers, potatoes are boiled, mashed, and mixed with flour, spices, and water to form a dough. The dough is then rolled out, cut into small pieces, and deep-fried until crispy. The crackers are often served as a snack or appetizer with chutney or other dipping sauces.
